titleStmt.title: Ecclesiasticum, or, A plain and familiar Christian conference concerning gospel churches, and order for the information and benefit of those who shall seek the Lord their God and ask the way to Zion with their faces thitherward ...
titleStmt.author: Chauncy, Isaac, 1632-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.S. for the publisher and are to be sold by W. Marshall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
